meanings.sent1: The garbage left in the hot sun was the yuckiest smell imaginable.
meanings.sent2: That spoiled milk is the yuckiest thing in the fridge.
meanings.sent3: Even the dog made a face at the yuckiest leftovers.
meanings.sent4: The slimy texture of the yuckiest food made my stomach turn.
meanings.sent5: The yuckiest part of the movie was when the monster appeared unexpectedly.

meanings.sent1: The yuckiest candy I ever tasted was the one that tasted like soap.
meanings.sent2: Her room was the yuckiest in the house, with dirty socks everywhere.
meanings.sent3: The yuckiest color for a car would be neon pink with purple polka dots.
meanings.sent4: The yuckiest sound I heard was the screeching of the chalk on the blackboard.
meanings.sent5: The yuckiest feeling is stepping on a slug barefoot in the dark.
